en.name: Xuantao Nie
en.bio: A graduate student majoring in facial expression recognition; Java development.
researchAreas: Deep Learning for Facial Expression Recognition
Early Detection of Mild Cognitive Impairment in the Elderly Using Computer Vision

recentProjects.title: Hmall E-commerce Platform
recentProjects.description: An online shopping platform providing features such as product browsing, ordering, and payment. Built on SpringCloud microservices architecture with vertical business splitting into microservices including: user service, product service, order service, shopping cart service, and payment service. Uses Nacos for service governance and RabbitMQ for asynchronous communication.

recentProjects.title: Hmdp Review Platform
recentProjects.description: A front-end and back-end separated project developed with SpringBoot, utilizing Redis cluster, Tomcat cluster, and MySQL cluster to enhance service performance. Similar to Dianping, it implements features such as SMS login, merchant query caching, and coupon flash sales. Notably implements one-person-one-order functionality using distributed locks.

zh.name: Xuantao Nie
zh.bio: 在读研究生，主要研究方向为面部表情识别；Java开发。
researchAreas: 面部表情识别的深度学习
基于计算机视觉的老年人轻度认知障碍检测

recentProjects.title: 黑马商城
recentProjects.description: 网上购物平台，提供商品游览、下单、支付等功能，基于SpringCloud微服务架构，业务按照纵向拆分，可以分为以下几个微服务：用户服务、商品服务、订单服务、购物车服务和支付服务，Nacos进行服务治理，RabbitMQ实现服务异步通讯

recentProjects.title: 黑马点评
recentProjects.description: 一个springboot开发的前后端分离项目，使用了redis集群、tomcat集群、MySQL集群提高服务性能。类似于大众点评，实现了短信登录、商户查询缓存、优惠卷秒杀等功能。其中重点使用了分布式锁实现了一人一单功能

recentProjects.title: 深度表情识别实验
recentProjects.description: 使用了FER2013数据集，使用了多个 sota模型进行实验
